title: Riot can we have some kind of update on the Mac bugs?
body: It's getting really tiring having to continue to deal with these bugs. It's been like what, 5 weeks now? All we have gotten about this were a few board posts. I really do feel like this has been handled as if Mac players don't matter, which saddens me.  I can barely remember the last game I've played that I've been able to play with sound.

replies.body:
Heya! 

We made an [update post](http://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-reports-eu/jT9W0Jc1-16-04-16-update-on-mac-performance-issue0) on the 16th. TL;DR, we're looking to get a fix in for Patch 6.8. Sorry for the delay, it's been a bit more difficult than we anticipated in terms of getting a solid fix.
Thank you so much for responding, it's really comforting to hear about a fix.
Of course! Sorry it took so long. ;_;

Yay one less excuse for me sucking in teamfights :P

ty Katey, great to hear there's a fix on the way
